changeSet.author: truknavocih
changeSet.sql: create database if not exists personnel_management; create table if not exists personnel_management.T_DEP ( D_ID varchar(255) not null, D_FORMATION_DATE varchar(255), D_DESC varchar(255), D_NAME varchar(255), D_PHONE varchar(255), primary key (D_ID)); create table if not exists personnel_management.T_EMP (E_ID varchar(255) not null, E_BIRTH_DATE varchar(255), E_EMPLOYMENT_DATE varchar(255), E_MAIL varchar(255), E_SURNAME varchar(255), E_MIDDLE_NAME varchar(255), E_NAME varchar(255), E_PHONE varchar(255), E_POSITION varchar(255), D_ID varchar(255), primary key (E_ID)); alter table personnel_management.T_EMP add constraint FK3a9upsahvnwktgkba9x6qs204 foreign key (D_ID) references personnel_management.T_DEP (D_ID);

changeSet.author: truknavocih
truknavocih
